metadata.title: BPO and CX Industry Terms with Fuzzy Logic
metadata.description: Comprehensive list of Business Process Outsourcing and Customer Experience terms with NER categories, fuzzy matching variations, compliance terms, and multi-category watchlist entries with disambiguation rules

disambiguation_rules.AI: Map 'AI' to TECHNOLOGY when near tech keywords (model, inference, training, platform, algorithm, neural, machine learning). Map to LOC only with geographic cues (e.g., 'in AI', 'The Valley, AI'). Map to ORG only when 'AI, Inc.' or similar company structure is present.
disambiguation_rules.Rasa: Prefer PRODUCT when context includes technical implementation ('built with Rasa', 'using Rasa', 'Rasa framework'). Use ORG when business context present ('Rasa raised', 'Rasa acquired', 'Rasa announced').
disambiguation_rules.watsonx: Always treat as PRODUCT (IBM's AI platform). When 'IBM watsonx' appears, tag as PRODUCT under IBM organization.

terms.disambiguation_note: Map to TECHNOLOGY when near tech keywords (model, inference, training, platform). Map to LOC only with geographic cues (e.g., 'in AI', 'The Valley, AI'). Map to ORG only when 'AI, Inc.' or similar company structure is present.
Always treat as PRODUCT (IBM's AI platform). When 'IBM watsonx' appears, tag as PRODUCT under IBM organization.

Prefer PRODUCT when context includes technical implementation ('built with Rasa', 'using Rasa', 'Rasa framework'). Use ORG when business context present ('Rasa raised', 'Rasa acquired', 'Rasa announced').
